page.title: 04INDUSTRY
page.content: {Selly Oak}is a C19th development based on the{metal industry,}attracted by transport facilities.The original industry was{gunsmiths,}such as the Westley Richards Company,who were founded in 1812.Their main market today is the U.S.A. with 80% of their product being exported.The Birmingham Battery Tube Company was founded in 1836 in Digbeth.In 1871,new works were opened in Selly Oak.Known worldwide as one of the leading producer of sea water pipe lines,condensers,tubes and plates.Other important industries in this area are{drop forging}with the G.Morgan Company producing castings for cars and mines.There are also{gear {box}and{machine tool}manufacturers.All firms plans for the future were just to survive,with unemployment trends upwards some halving employment since 1980.
